testcase.name: Start date is greater than end date
testcase.system-out: Given Go to ISTools.........................................................passed When Login IST with valid credentials.......................................passed Then Login Success..........................................................passed And Select Arrow Menu "Real Time Disbursement"..............................passed And Select Menu "Hold Payment Configuration"................................passed And Input "Start Date Hold Payment" with value "30-01-2021".................passed And Input "Release Date" with value "25-01-2021"............................passed And Click button "Add"......................................................passed And Get text from pop up "IT Supporting Tools" with text "Release date must be after start date".passed And Click button "OK".......................................................passed And Click button "Logout"...................................................passed And Close browser...........................................................passed
